origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'MarketResearchAPI.fetch_articles', 'description': 'This function fetches articles based on the specified topic, count, and date. If the date is set to 'latest', it fetches the most recent articles.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The topic of the articles to fetch.'}, {'name': 'count', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of articles to fetch.'}, {'name': 'date', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The date of the articles to fetch, or 'latest' for the most recent articles.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of articles matching the specified criteria.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 MarketResearchAPI.fetch_articles, 它的参数输入如下: 'topic'是'emerging markets stocks', 'count'是'3', 'date'是'latest'.
